serviceArea: Portland metropolitan area - 30 mile radius including Milwaukie, Lake Oswego, Clackamas, Gresham, Beaverton, Tigard (Oregon only, not Washington State)
shortDescription: Expert chimney sweeping & masonry services. Licensed, Bonded, Insured (CCB #250143). FREE estimates. Serving Portland metro area. Family-owned business.
longDescription: Highlander Chimney Sweeping & Masonry, LLC is a local, family-owned business led by Colin Swartz, offering professional chimney services throughout the Portland metropolitan area. With experience sweeping and repairing several thousand chimneys, Highlander provides a full-service solution for all chimney needs. Services include chimney sweeping (cleaning) for brick fireplaces and wood stoves, chimney safety inspections, leak inspections, brick and mortar repair, rain cap installation, waterproofing, damper repair and installation, pellet stove cleaning, and dryer vent cleaning. Serving both commercial and residential properties. Licensed, Bonded, and Insured with Oregon CCB License #250143. Company motto in Scottish Gaelic: 'Losgadh s√†bhailte - Losgadh glic - Losgadh an-asgaidh' meaning BURN SAFE - BURN SMART - BURN FREE.
